reviewtext: If you're in the market for a portable CB option - please do yourself a favor and seriously consider the Midland 75-822.What makes this portable CB option great is that it is a reliable source for inside your vehicle - and you can just as quickly switch out of it and start using it outside of your vehicle.  Which is great when you are traveling convoy-style on a Jeep run or similar activity.  Does it work as well as permanently installed CB?  Maybe not - but this one has worked great for me.
